sentences.sentence: He has little patience for sloppy work from colleagues.
sentences.translation: 他无法忍耐同事们马虎的工作。

sentences.sentence: When your clothes look sloppy, so do you.
sentences.translation: 如果你的衣服看起来邋遢，你也一样。

sentences.sentence: Embroidery calls for great care. There must not be even a single sloppy stitch.
sentences.translation: 刺绣要求很高，一针也不能马虎。
